entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
